Add comprehensive plan for player news scraper feature

Plan Overview:
- Create player_news and team_news database tables
- Build player-news-scraper.js using ESPN News API
- Integrate with player profiles

- player_news table with 15 columns
- news_category_enum (6 types)
- Indexes on player_id, published_at, category, breaking
- Deduplication via external_id unique constraint
- 30-day news retention

1. Database Setup (30 min) - Create tables, enums, indexes

3. Scheduler Integration (30 min) - Hourly cron job
4. Player Profile Integration (1-2 hrs) - News section in profiles
5. News Feed Page (1-2 hrs) - Dedicated news page with filters

Key Features:
- Keyword-based auto-categorization (80%+ accuracy target)
- Breaking news detection (<1 hour old)
- Duplicate prevention via external_id
- Rate limiting (1 req/sec to ESPN)
- Breaking news badges with pulse animation
- Mobile-responsive Next Down Metrics theme
- Filter by team, player, category, date
- Search functionality

API Endpoints:
- ESPN NFL News: https://site.api.espn.com/apis/site/v2/sports/football/nfl/news

- 80%+ categorization accuracy
- Breaking news flagged & displayed prominently
- Player profiles show recent news (30 days)
- News feed with working filters
- Hourly updates via scheduler
- Mobile responsive
- No ESPN rate limit violations

Future Enhancements:
- Sentiment analysis
- Multiple news sources (Rotoworld, CBS, Fox)
- Push notifications for breaking news
- News bookmarking
- AI-powered summaries
- Recommendation engine
